name: Ys I & II Eternal Story
synopsis: Ys I & II Eternal Story is a port of the 1997 PC release of the remakes of both Ys I: Ancient Ys Vanished and Ys II: Ancient Ys Vanished - The Final Chaper. Included in this port along with the previous improvements are new characters and items. Ys I & II Eternal Story is also the prequel to [[Ys III: Wanderers from Ys]].
